elements.name: Verify Ordering Landing Page

steps.name: SevenBOSS application launches ISP Landing page
Verify PlaceOrder tile got loaded and it has some data
Verify reporting tile
Verify Support functions tile

elements.name: Verify Ordering a multi day item with Order Remaining Items True

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Click on All Radio button
Check only Multi Day checkbox for selecting Multi day item
Select the first avilable multiday item and Verify remaing Items to Order
Click on Continue Button
Verify Cursor if defaulted to first question
Verify the default values for all questions for first item
Answer all the questions
Verify the Formula
Answer the questions with special characters
Answer the questions with Zero
Verify the Daily Trend for last '4' days
Verify the Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks for Multiday Item
Verify the Next day Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks for Multiday Item
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Click On NO button on modal pop up
Verify the Daily Trend for last '10' days
Click on Submit Button

elements.name: Verify Ordering a multi day item with Order Remaining Items False with Carried Items

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Multi Day checkbox for selecting Multi day item
Disable the Order remaining items only radio button
Select the first avilable multiday item and Verify remaing Items to Order
Click on Continue Button
Verify Cursor if defaulted to Order textBox
Answer all the questions
Verify the Formula
Update Order quantity for second item
Verify the Daily Trend for last '4' days
Verify the Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks for Multiday Item
Verify the Next day Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks for Multiday Item
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Click On NO button on modal pop up
Verify the Daily Trend for last '10' days
Click on Submit Button

elements.name: Verify Ordering a single day item with Order Remaining Items True and with All Items Radio button ON

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Multi Day checkbox for selecting Multi day item
Disable the Order remaining items only radio button
Click on All Radio button
Select the first avilable multiday item and Verify remaing Items to Order
Click on Continue Button
Verify the Daily Trend for last '4' days
Verify the Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks for Multiday Item
Verify the Next day Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks for Multiday Item
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Click On NO button on modal pop up
Verify the Daily Trend for last '10' days
Click on Submit Button

elements.name: Verify Warning message when you click on Home button in the middle of transaction

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Multi Day checkbox for selecting Multi day item
Select the first avilable multiday item and Verify remaing Items to Order
Click on Continue Button
Click in Home Button and verify the popup for Multiday Item
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Disable the Order remaining items only radio button
Check only Multi Day checkbox for selecting Multi day item
Select the first avilable multiday item and Verify remaing Items to Order
Click on Continue Button
Enter Order Quantity ONE in the Order text box and click Enter Key for multiday
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Click on No Button
Enter Order quantity for first item in review and finalize page for 'MultiDay'
Click On Home Button and verify that we are in ordering page

elements.name: Verify Ordering a Multi day item with Order Remaining Items False and order all items with 10 Quantity

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Multi Day checkbox for selecting Multi day item
Disable the Order remaining items only radio button
Select the first avilable multiday item and Verify remaing Items to Order
Click on Continue Button
Enter Order Quantity as '10' all the items
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Click On NO button on modal pop up
Verify the Daily Trend for last '10' days
Verify the Items Ordered count matches
Click on Submit Button
Verify that Order reaminging Quantity as '0'

elements.name: Verify Ordering a Non-daily item with Order Remaining Items True

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Non-Daily checkbox for selecting Non-Daily item
Select the first avilable Non-Daily item and Verify remaing Items to Order
Click on Continue Button
Verify Cursor if defaulted to first question
Get the required Item details from the Service for 'NonDaily'
Verify Tooltip for the Item
Answer the question on forecast sales

steps.name: Enter Order Quantity ONE in the Order text box and click Enter Key for Non-Daily items
Verify the Daily Trend for last '8' days
Verify the Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks for Non_daily Item
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Verify that we will get modal popup with No. of items not ordered
Click On NO button on modal pop up
Verify the Daily Trend for last '10' days
Click on Submit Button
Verify that Order Landing page got opened and Remaining to Order was decreased by one for Non-Daily Items

elements.name: Verify Daily items Reporting Data

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Daily checkbox for selecting single day item
Disable the Order remaining items only radio button
Select All Daily Items
Click on Continue Button
Get the all items names and Order Quantity
Click in Home Button and verify the popup
Click on Reporting tab
Check only Daily checkbox for selecting single day item
Select All Daily Items in Reporting Page
Click on Continue Button
Wait for Spinner to close
Verify the default Date set to OrderWindow Date
Get reporting details by Item for Single day items

elements.name: Verify Multiday items Reporting Data

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Disable the Order remaining items only radio button
Check only Multi Day checkbox for selecting Multi day item
Select the first avilable multiday item and Verify remaing Items to Order
Click on Continue Button
Get the all items names and Order Quantity
Click in Home Button and verify the popup

elements.name: Verify Ordering a single day item with Order Remaining Items True

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Daily checkbox for selecting single day item
Select All Daily Items
Click on Continue Button
Get the required Item details from the Service for 'Daily'
Verify Cursor if defaulted to order quantity text box
Verify Tooltip for the Item
If remaining Orders are more than Zero, Enter Zero in Order text box then click on Enter Key
ReOrder the Item with Zero in Order text box then click on Enter Key
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Verify that we will get modal popup with minimum order quantity
click On YES button on modal pop up and verify that Cursor is placed in order text box
Enter number Max number in order textbox and click on Enter Key
Verify that we will get modal popup with Maximum order quantity
Click on Close Button
Enter Order Quantity ONE in the Order text box and click Enter Key
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Click On NO button on modal pop up
Verify the Daily Trend for last '10' days
Click on Submit Button
Verify that Order Landing page got opened and Remaining to Order was decreased by one

elements.name: Verify Ordering a single day item with Order Remaining Items False

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Daily checkbox for selecting single day item
Disable the Order remaining items only radio button
Select All Daily Items
Click on Continue Button
Order Submit Date
Verify Order Delivered Date
Enter Order Quantity ONE in the Order text box and click Enter Key
Verify the Daily Trend for last '8' days
Verify the Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Click On NO button on modal pop up
Verify the Daily Trend for last '10' days
Click on Submit Button
Verify that Order Landing page got opened and Remaining to Order was decreased by one

elements.name: Verify Ordering a single day item with Order Remaining Items True and with All Items Radio button ON

steps.name: You are in BOSS home page
Click Place Order from Landing Page to navigate to Order Selection page.
Check only Daily checkbox for selecting single day item
Disable the Order remaining items only radio button
Click on All Radio button
Select All Daily Items
Click on Continue Button
Clear the existing order quantity and make sure that we have defaulted to Zero
Verify the Daily Trend for last '8' days
Verify the Weekly Trend for last '4' weeks
Close the Chevron
Click on Review and Finalise Button
Click On NO button on modal pop up
Verify the Daily Trend for last '10' days
Modify the Order quantity for one item in review and finalise page
Click on Submit Button
Verify that Order Landing page got opened and Remaining to Order was decreased by one
